description: Kevin approached me in a local Montreal bar asking for more details about Maskurbate. Kevin is that next door guy that likes gaming and chilling with friends. He has undeniable charm and I found him very attractive. Though he is straight and his girlfriend doesn't know about his desire to perform on Maskurbate, he told me he was very open and willing to experiment with a few things with a mask on. Since this is his first porn scene ever, I decided to go slow on him, and start with a solo, so we could learn about each other, keeping in mind there will be more to come in upcoming scenes.Meet Kevin!
title: Kevin, Scene #01
